author: Luke Kawa and Tracy Alloway
title: Yahoo should be euthanised, CEO Marissa Mayer grossly overpaid: NYU Professor
text:
Marissa Mayer: The 40-year-old executive faces harsh criticism over her performance at Yahoo. AP "She got a reprieve from death row because she's pregnant with twins."
The professor deemed the search engine company's board to be a lesson in poor corporate governance, and said it would fare better under the control of other management, such as Microsoft.
'It's time to euthanise this thing' "We should put a bullet in the head of this story called Yahoo," he said. "It is time to euthanise this thing."
 On Tuesday, Yahoo announced that it had withdrawn its request for an approval of its plan for a tax-free spin off of its stake in e-commerce company Alibaba.
The stock closed down 2.15 per cent on Tuesday, and have lost roughly one quarter of their value in the past year.
Mayer's pay package jumped 69 per cent to $US42.1 million last year as she worked on a turnaround of the Web portal.
Since taking the helm in 2012, Mayer has struggled to add users and woo advertisers by focusing on mobile, adding online channels and signing partners.
Yahoo's stock has risen during her tenure largely because of the value of the company's Asian assets, including the Alibaba stake.
"Marissa Mayer is the most overpaid CEO in history," concluded Galloway.
Bloomberg
